metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11548 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.8.9. It has Incorrect Access Control. Unprivileged members of a projectare able to post comments on confidential issues through an authorizationissue in the note endpoint.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
